thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: South Africa's Nedbank to keep KPMG for 2018 financial year

title: South Africa's Nedbank to keep KPMG for 2018 financial year

organizations.name: old mutual plc and old mutual ltd

text:
May 3, 2018 / 10:26 AM / Updated 13 minutes ago South Africa's Nedbank to keep KPMG for 2018 financial year Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
JOHANNESBURG, May 3 (Reuters) - South Africaâ€™s Nedbank Group said on Thursday it would reappoint Deloitte and scandal-hit KPMG as its joint external auditors for its 2018 financial year, after Barclays Africa Group became the latest company to drop KPMG.
Nedbank said it was required to have the same auditor as its parent companies, Old Mutual Plc and Old Mutual Ltd, whose shareholders supported the reappointment of KPMG as their auditor for the 2018 financial year. (Reporting by Tiisetso Motsoeneng; Writing by James Macharia; Editing by Mark Potter)
